code: import React from'react';import'../styles/Clubs.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Clubs=()=>{const clubsData=[{title:"Рахова 53",info:["18 ПК с Game Room и VIP-зоной","Кресла DXRacer"]},{title:"Астраханская 15/8",info:["18 ПК с Game Room и VIP-зоной","Кресла DXRacer","Зоны PS5 и PS4 PRO"]},{title:"Московская 11",info:["18 ПК с Game Room и VIP-зоной","Кресла DXRacer"]}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"clubs",className:"clubs-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-title-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"arrow-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/30_112.svg",alt:"arrow",className:"arrow-left"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/30_113.svg",alt:"arrow",className:"arrow-right"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"\u041D\u0430\u0448\u0438 \u043A\u043B\u0443\u0431\u044B"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"clubs-grid",children:clubsData.map((club,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"club-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:club.title}),club.info.map((item,itemIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item},itemIndex)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"club-card-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#booking",className:"btn",children:"\u041F\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0439\u0442\u0438 \u043A \u0431\u0440\u043E\u043D\u0438"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#cafe",className:"btn",children:"\u041F\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0439\u0442\u0438 \u0432 \u043A\u0430\u0444\u0435"})]})]},index))})]})});};export default Clubs;
